Masterstation

Class MS_Manager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Masterstation.MS_Manager

  • public abstract class MS_Manager
extends java.lang.Object
    MS_Manager manages the file receiver and master station GUI Launches master station GUI Creates file receiver Allows to set port number for file receiver Sets each station into the array of stations Allows to check if specified port number for the station is a valid number Allows to remove specific ground station Allows to remove all stations from the array at once
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Yevgeniy Lischuk

      Method to create a file receiver with specified port number
      static void disconnectAllStations()
      Method to remove all ground stations from the array list Uses Iterator to increment station array list Removes all stations from the list Disconnects all stations from communication (closes the socket)

      • isPortAvailable

        public static boolean isPortAvailable(java.lang.String portString,
                                      int radix)
        Method to check if the text typed in a box is correct (4-integer number) Checks if string is not equal to 4 Checks each character in a string for being an integer Checks if the string is empty Checks if port number is equal to the port number of any previous stations
        Parameters:
        portString - - a string to check
        radix - - radix, range
        Returns:
        correct - verify that string is a 4-digit integer number
